# james-in-a-box

> LLM-powered autonomous software engineering agent in a Docker sandbox

james-in-a-box runs Claude Code CLI inside an isolated Docker container,
enabling autonomous software development with security boundaries.

## Documentation

- [Documentation Index](index.md): Complete navigation index for all docs
- [Main README](../README.md): Project overview and quick start
- [Architecture ADR](adr/in-progress/ADR-Autonomous-Software-Engineer.md): Core system design

## Key Concepts

- **Sandboxed Environment**: Docker container with no credentials
- **Human-in-the-Loop**: Agent proposes, human approves and merges
- **Bidirectional Slack**: Two-way communication with the agent
- **Context Sync**: Confluence, JIRA, and GitHub data synced to container
